nodes.text: Raid on the Cybloc Transfer Station

A raid was conducted by Maul and his brother Savage Opress on the Cybloc Transfer Station during the Clone Wars. The Nightbrothers departed by commandeering an Aurore-class freighter. Afterward, Maul's nemesis Obi-Wan Kenobi and fellow Jedi Master Adi Gallia investigated the attack, and were informed Maul was heading for the Sertar sector, leading Kenobi to deduce he planned to recruit the Ohnaka Gang.
